item.title: Cypher, Gremlin and SPARQL: Graph dialects
item.description: When I was younger and my older brother was living in Germany, I asked him if he had learned German. He said that he did, and explained that there are several dialects, and he was quite proud for some people told him that he was using the Bavarian dialect correctly. Even though Cypher, Gremlin and SPARQL are all query languages, I think we can consider them dialects of a common graph language.
